comments.content:
It is a constructivist font similar to one I designed. This one looks like a P22 De Stijl

[http://www.p22.com/products/constructivist.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20070315124913/http:/www.p22.com/products/constructivist.html)

ChrisL

[Almost.](http://web.archive.org/web/20070315124913/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=PY.114299.0.1&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=THE+MUSIC&sampleSize=48) There’s also The Foundry’s [Van Doesburg](http://web.archive.org/web/20070315124913/http:/www.foundrytypes.co.uk/foundry_architype_1/van_doesburg.html), but that isn’t it either. This sample looks like a less strict interpretation of the style.

Here is a sample of my font, Weimar Plakat 1923:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/files/themusic_3457.png)

ChrisL

What is the text you need to set?

ChrisL
Just go ahead and release that thing, Chris!
